I'm not able to find the log file you describe, even after enabling the log=
ToFile value to true.

r under jobs?

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Noah Levitt <nlevitt=
@...> wrote:
>
> Hello,
> 
> To log the scoping decisions set this property=
 on your DecideRuleSequence:
>   <property name=3D"logToFile" value=3D"true=
" />
> The log file will be named after the bean id of the DecideRuleSequen=
ce,
> thus "scope.log" by default.
> 
> Noah
> 
>

t 10:33 AM, Pheonix
